item.description: I was a postdoc with Dr. Johannes SÃ¶ding at the Quantitative and Computational Biology group at MPIBPC. I develop tools for the analysis of eukaryotic metagenomic data. Before that, I did my PhD at the departments of Cell Research & Immunology and Molecular Biology & Ecology of Plants at TAU under the joint supervision of Prof. Tal Pupko and Prof. Itay Mayrose. My work focused on statistical techniques in molecular evolution.
